1.query menu
AT+STKMENU
return:

AT+STKENV="D30782020181900146"

3. open menu
AT+STKENV="D30782020181900101" 

AT+CUSATE="D30782020181900180"



1.query menu
AT+STKMENU
AT+STKTR="810301250082028281830100830100",1


2.SELECT MENU
AT+CUSATE="D30782020181900101"            NO item

AT+CUSATE="D30782020181900146"            HAVE item 1-7

AT+CUSATE="D3078202018190014B"            HAVE ITEM 1-5

AT+CUSATE="D3078202018190014E"

ÓÃÓÚSIM
AT+STKENV="D30782020181900146"

4. return to MAIN MENU
AT+STKTR="810301230082028281830110",2

5.SELECT ITEM
AT+STKTR="810301240082028281830100900101",5

AT+CUSATE="D30782020181900102"





A PROCESSDURE



AT+EINFO=32
OK
